title: Bug 19458[Navigator] Copy Project dialog UI problems
description: clean f2:create a single project, say 'test'.copy, paste.on the 'copy project' dialog:1. with use default location checked, i should still be able to select to viewor copy the default location from the edit box below.2. if i uncheck the default location checkbox, the default location shouldremain in the edit box (it should not clear it). perhaps i want to choose apath close to the default location.3. choose the project name to be 'test'.notice that a static text validation error appears on the dialog. this is inred text. it should be black text, and include the standard ontheflyvalidation small error icon.
